channel.title: Article about how much I want Black Mesa to come out
channel.description:
Hey, I'm an author at nakedrobber.com (video game blog for people who enjoy dead hooker jokes and ignorant geek humor)
I've been waiting for Black Mesa for what feels like eternity, so I thought I might as well throw up an article about it. I thought you guys and girls might be interested in so I'm posting it up here.
[url]https://www.nakedrobber.com/2010/02/11/black-mesa-the-mod-i-want/[/url]
Feel free to throw out a couple comments if you like it or hate.
Cheers

item.title: Article about how much I want Black Mesa to come out
item.dc:creator: NakedRobber
item.description:
Well I’m glad someone out there appreciates dead hooker jokes!

Sorry if the title mislead anyone, but thanks for giving it a read. I hope a few of you got some laughs out of it.

Now it’s back to waiting for black mesa to come out. I guess I’ll return to my usual routine of staring at a wall and ignoring my English lessons from high school.

Read full topic

Good on you Catz for getting that sorted within an hour in an intelligent and calm manner. :3

item.source: Article about how much I want Black Mesa to come out

item.title: Article about how much I want Black Mesa to come out
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
The almighty power of the pen. The ability to put together an intelligent paragraph is undervalued these days.

Case in point. My son bought a blackberry on ebay in January, but when he got it, it came with the wrong data cable. Since then, he has been writing them asking for a replacement. His grammar and sentence phrasing screamed 12 year old.

Finally yesterday I had enough of seeing emails go back and forth so I stepped in. I wrote a long email detailing the purchase, the specs, and a photo of what was sent and a photo of what we should have recieved and a requested date of when we could expect a resolution. I then put in a negative rating on ebay.

I got a call from head of customer service within the hour and we came to an agreement where my son would get the $25 bucks it would cost to get a data cable.

Was it the ebay negative rating? Was it the lengthy email? I dunno. But I would like to think that having the ability to complain in detail but in a non agressive way helped.

Read full topic
item.source: Article about how much I want Black Mesa to come out

Work on your grammar though.
